name: electable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
related to making a decision or choice, especially the choice of a person for a particular job, by voting: Clinton's youthful image made him an extremely electable candidate. Some in the party worried that he simply wasn't electable. See
elect
More examplesFewer examplesThese candidates are seen, even by those who prefer them, as not electable.Among Conservative voters he is seen as the most electable candidate.She is being seen as the strongest leader and the most electable contender.
